channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices】Microsoft鼠标设备随附的USB到PS/2鼠标适配器的注释
item.description: 【It's a purely mechanical adapter that relies on smarts in the mouse itself.】这是一个纯粹的机械适配器，它依赖于鼠标本身中的智能。

item.title: 【VS Code C++ Extension Updates: 4x Faster Colorization & 3.5x Faster Project Startup】VS代码C ++扩展更新：4倍更快的着色速度和3.5倍更快的项目启动
item.description: 【In the latest releases of the C++ Extension in Visual Studio Code, we have focused on performance improvements and stability. A fast, responsive, and reliable development environment is essential for maintaining productivity, especially in large and complex C++ projects. These updates include many incremental optimizations that collectively speed up the time from opening a C++ […]】在Visual Studio代码中C ++扩展的最新版本中，我们专注于绩效改进和稳定性。快速，响应迅速且可靠的开发环境对于维持生产力至关重要，尤其是在大型和复杂的C ++项目中。这些更新包括许多增量优化，这些优化共同加快了打开C ++的时间[…]

item.title: 【We’ll fly you to Atlanta, Texas, and getting to your hotel in Atlanta, Georgia is your problem】我们将带您去德克萨斯州亚特兰大，到达佐治亚州亚特兰大的酒店是您的问题
item.description: 【Reading the fine print.】阅读精美的印刷品。

item.title: 【Exploring new .NET releases with Dev Containers】使用开发容器探索新的.NET版本
item.description: 【Learn how to set up and use dev containers for experimenting with new .NET releases.】了解如何设置和使用开发容器来尝试新的.NET版本。

item.title: 【Xbox + .NET Aspire: Transforming Local Development Practices】Xbox + .Net Aspire：改变本地发展实践
item.description: 【Learn how the Xbox services team leveraged .NET Aspire to boost their team's productivity.】了解Xbox服务团队如何利用.NET渴望提高团队的生产力。

item.title: 【Semantic Kernel Agent Framework RC2】语义内核代理框架RC2
item.description: 【Three weeks ago we released the Release the Agents! SK Agents Framework RC1 | Semantic Kernel and we’ve been thrilled to see the momentum grow. Thank you to everyone who has shared feedback, filed issues, and started building with agents in Semantic Kernel—we’re seeing more developers try agents than ever before. Today, we’re declaring build […]】三个星期前，我们发布了发行版《代理商》！ SK代理框架RC1 |语义内核，我们很高兴看到动量增长。感谢所有共享反馈，提出问题并开始与代理商在语义内核中建立的人 - 我们看到开发人员比以往任何时候都多尝试代理。今天，我们宣布建造[…]

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB Conf 2025: Learn, Build, and Connect with the Community】Azure Cosmos DB Conf 2025：学习，建立和与社区建立和联系
item.description: 【Join us for the 5th annual Azure Cosmos DB Conf, a free virtual developer event co-hosted by Microsoft and the Azure Cosmos DB community. This is your opportunity to learn from Microsoft product managers, industry experts, and real-world customers who are building applications with Azure Cosmos DB. This year, we received over 100 session proposals […]】加入我们，参加第五届年度Azure Cosmos DB Conf，这是由Microsoft和Azure Cosmos DB社区共同主持的免费虚拟开发人员活动。这是您向Microsoft产品经理，行业专家和正在使用Azure Cosmos DB构建应用程序的现实世界客户学习的机会。今年，我们收到了100多个会议建议[…]

item.title: 【PIX 2503.24: misc bug fixes】PIX 2503.24：MISC错误修复
item.description: 【Today we released PIX version 2503.24, which can be downloaded here. This release includes everything in the previous 2501.30 release, plus the following bug fixes: Fix capture-time crash introduced in 2501.30 in CPU write tracking code Fix capture-time issue with reserved resources, that could cause replay-time corruption for some UE5 captures Fix PIXBeginCapture() deadlocking for Timing […]】今天，我们发布了PIX版本2503.24，可以在此处下载。此版本包括上一版本中的所有内容，以及以下错误修复：修复捕获时间崩溃在2501.30中引入的CPU写入跟踪代码修复了使用保留资源的捕获时间问题，这可能会导致某些UE5捕获的重播时间损坏fix fix fix pixbegincapture（pixbebegincapture（

item.title: 【Boost Your CMake Development with Copilot Custom Instructions】使用Copilot自定义说明增强您的CMAKE开发
item.description: 【Introduction Creating a new CMake project that uses unfamiliar libraries can be daunting and time-consuming. This blog post takes you along on my journey using Copilot to make this easier, and leveraging Custom Instructions to tailor Copilot responses. For a sneak peek, see the outcome of this journey in this repository. Background As C++ developers […]】引言创建一个新的CMAKE项目，该项目使用不熟悉的库可能令人生畏和耗时。这篇博客文章将带您使用Copilot的旅程，以使这一更轻松，并利用自定义说明来定制Copilot响应。要偷看，请参阅此存储库中的这一旅程的结果。背景为C ++开发人员[…]

item.title: 【Announcing the winners of the 2025 Powerful Devs Hack Together】宣布2025年强大的开发人员的获奖者一起攻击
item.description: 【The 2025 Powerful Devs Hack Together brought developers together to build secure and scalable AI-powered solutions using Power Platform, Azure, AI Builder, and more. If you missed the event, you can still catch up on all the sessions covering AI, automation, security, extensibility, and more! 🎥 Watch here: aka.ms/powerfuldevs/ondemand Technologies Used in the Hackathon We […]】2025年功能强大的开发人员将开发人员聚集在一起，使用电源平台，Azure，AI Builder等建造安全可扩展的AI驱动解决方案。如果您错过了活动，您仍然可以赶上所有涵盖AI，自动化，安全性，可扩展性等的会话！ 🎥在这里观看：aka.ms/poperfuldevs/ondemand Technologies We […]
